original_text: So the king's officers went out of the city to try to find the two Israelite men. They went along the road to the Jordan River, to the place where the road crosses the river. As soon as they had left, people shut the city gate.
korean_text: 그 사람들은 요단 나루터까지 그들을 쫓아갔고 그들을 뒤쫓는 자들이 나가자 곧 성문을 닫았더라

sentences.original_text: So the king's officers went out of the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 왕의 관리들이 성 밖으로 나갔습니다

sentences.original_text: to try to find the two Israelite men
They went along the road to the Jordan River
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 요단강으로 가는 길을 따라 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: to the place where the road crosses the river
As soon as they had left
